Reviews.Title: Terrific buy, excellent camera!
Reviews.Author: Mary W. Stewart "mary s"
Reviews.Content: Absolutely love it, love it, love it!!!!!  Light weight, easy to operate, and pictures and ability to change the settings easy and intriguing.  Can many artistic shots.  Has ability to change the exposure when you need more or less light.  Night photography is amazing!  Took it on vacation to Europe, and am treasuring all of my over 600 photos!

Reviews.Title: coolpix L820
Reviews.Author: John OHara
Reviews.Content: great camera for average photog . great pics, great battery life, ( use Lithium  batts. ). light weight. great value...

Reviews.Title: Too Soon To Tell
Reviews.Author: Leslie A. Hargand
Reviews.Content: It appears to be a great camera.  Looking forward to a long relationship!  So far the quality of the pictures has been clear, grain-free, and focused perfectly.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Gatergirl
Reviews.Content: Bought this for a gift and digital photography class. It was loved and exactly what she wanted.  She will be able to use this camera for years!

Reviews.Title: Got what I was expecting.
Reviews.Author: rabarsb
Reviews.Content: The price was right for all the item I received.  After using it for a little while, yes it is a great product that delivers what it was promised...great pictures and amazing hd video.

Reviews.Title: inaccurate bundle description
Reviews.Author: Venus Jones
Reviews.Content: The HDMI cable in the bundle is not compatible with the camera. You will need a different cable to connect it to pc.
